message.body: Cindy is coming around noon tomorrow. I was going to ask her to check out yours & Phillips rooms too.
I had a bite but just one and wasn't sure I got it from my room
Yes check my room sure
Tho she has never found anything
OK. Will you be home?
No unfortunately :/
I'm housesitting for Monica amor and it is the classiest experience
￼Her nightstand that is currently next to me
Her 7 yr old daughter has a better vocabulary and is more intelligent than 99% of my highschool graduating class was
Kids like that crack me up. They sound like someone studying for their masters even though they are in 2nd grade.
It's fun getting to see how the other half lives. I always think - Yeah I could get used to this.
It's very aspirational actually. I almost texted everyone to tell them I couldn't go out for the next three months bc I had to focus on my writing/job apps hahaha
Just being around success really does make you want it. I mean...I just want the fancy face creams really lol
But yes I'll redry everything and be careful w my room again
Haha. I don't need any face creams but I get your point.
We got a nice little house in a nice neighborhood but the neighborhoods next to us are super nice.
I'm at one of the beach closest to our house. This is the house in back of me. It must be 50000 Sq ft
This is the view it looks out on. ￼
On the right way in the distance are Molokai, Maui & Lanai.
This ia one of 27 houses that this crazy Japanese Billionaire bought years ago. It's a pretty crazy story.
http://www.honolulumagazine.com/Honolulu-Magazine/Real-Estate/May-2014/Bye-Bye-Genshiro-Kawamoto--Hello-Kahala-Avenue-Property-Values/#.VBzsE2S9Kc0
Anyway if you get a chance - come visit. The place is pretty cool.
I spoke with Cindy. She said is headed there later but isn't sure what time she is going to be there.
Cindy said she found 3 bed bugs in David's room but none in your room or Phillips room.
She said she changed chemicals & sprayed in your room & David's room. She thinks that should do the trick.
That sounds like fun.
So I'm too busy taking fancy showers w her expensive microbead body lotions to go home and do that LoL
Hahaha!! Must be nice.......
Haha also too busy having an artgasm over her book collection
Lol. Artgasm. Never heard that one before.
Wouldn't it be a Litgasm??
￼Her night stand !!!!
She's so classy. Why don't I have bedside Borge
*borges
In the original ftw
Omg that first photo of the house omg!!!!!
Haaa yes but the book next to it is cage so I wanted a broader term
It's insanely large & has sat vacant for years. The whole street is so bizarre. It's like Gladwynne crossed with North Philly.
But touché touché
Wait a house based on Japanese pagodas!)???? In Hawaii whaaaaa
You are living the dream and I h888 you!!!!
If Gladwynne was sitting on the Pacific.
Everyone has problems everywhere. I'm def no exception. But I def try to be grateful for what I have.
It is really nice here. Not perfect but nice.
Don't h888 - come visit & check it out for yourself!
You know, my grandmother just have me a seaside property on the Black Sea but it's not renovated and needs to be
But once it's done
I will quit all my jobs and just travel haha
I interviewed for the full time front office position at the fabric workshop museum
But if I don't get it, maybe I'll take a break from my 3pt jobs and take lots of vacays
And you should visit my place in Romania! Haha already told all my roomies to come. Only oooh, $1000
Nbd
Lol jk
Flights are so expensive that's why I haven't gone
Cool. Does she still live over there?
She lives in Bucharest but she has a property on the Black Sea ooooh
I'd like to see all of Europe someday. Probably won't be if / when we move back to the East Coast. It's the other side of the world from here.
I think our next door neighbors are Romanian.
I love traveling but you do need time & money. That can be a tough combination.

If you ever decide to hear this way. All you need is a ticket & a little spending money. You can crash on our couch or we have a nice blow up mattress. We can pick you up, feed you, show you around etc.
I will ABSOLUTeLY keep that in mind!!
